subject: Baseball
Trades (Sports)
Wages and Salaries
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
lead_paragraph: For their three-year, $30 million investment, the Cubs got a clubhouse pariah in Milton Bradley who was suspended in mid-September for bad behavior.
snippet: For their three-year, $30 million investment, the Cubs got a clubhouse pariah in Milton Bradley who was suspended in mid-September for bad behavior.
